original_text: Last Summer I was travelling in a bus to my home town, Puri. The journey was filled with the sounds of the engine and the rhythmic swaying of the bus. As the sun began to set, casting a golden glow on the landscape, I noticed a vibrant blue sky above. I watched the trees and buildings on the sides of the road blur past, each scene a fleeting memory. Suddenly, a small, rusty metal fence caught my eye, a forgotten gatehouse standing near the edge of a field. The gate was half-open, revealing a pat
summary: last summer I was travelling in a bus to my home town, Puri. the journey was filled with the sounds of the engine and the rhythmic swaying of the bus. as the sun began to set, casting a golden glow on the landscape, I noticed a vibrant blue sky above.

original_text: Life in the city is full of activity. Early in the morning, hundreds of people rush out of their homes, and soon the streets are full of traffic. Shops and offices open, students flock to their schools, and the day's work begins. The city throbs with activity and is full of noise as the day progresses
summary: the city throbs with activity and is full of noise as the day progresses. hundreds rush out of their homes, and soon the streets are full of traffic.

original_text: Alice Hey Bob, are we meeting today? Bob Yes, at 3 PM. Alice Should I bring the reports? Bob Yes, we need them for the discussion.
summary: Alice Hey Bob, are we meeting today? Bob Yes, at 3 PM. Alice Should I bring the reports? Bob yes, we need them for the discussion.

original_text: Before you can begin to determine what the composition of a particular paragraph will be, you must first decide on a working thesis for your paper. What is the most important idea that you are trying to convey to your reader? The information in each paragraph must be related to that idea. In other words, your paragraphs should remind your reader that there is a recurrent relationship between your thesis and the information in each paragraph. summary: your paragraphs should remind your reader that there is a recurrent relationship between your thesis and the information in each paragraph. a working thesis functions like a seed from which your paper.

original_text: A fast rabbit was always bragging about his speed, but a slow tortoise challenged him to a race. The rabbit took the lead and, confident in his victory, decided to take a nap, thinking the tortoise was far too slow to ever catch up. However, the tortoise continued to plod along slowly and steadily, eventually crossing the finish line while the rabbit was asleep. The rabbit woke up, saw the tortoise had won, and learned that slow and steady wins the race
summary: the tortoise continued to plod along slowly and steadily, eventually crossing the finish line while the rabbit was asleep. the rabbit took the lead and, confident in his victory, decided to take a nap.

original_text: Before you can begin to determine what the composition of a particular paragraph will be, you must first decide on a working thesis for your paper. What is the most important idea that you are trying to convey to your reader? The information in each paragraph must be related to that idea. In other words, your paragraphs should remind your reader that there is a recurrent relationship between your thesis and the information in each paragraph. A working thesis functions like a seed from which your
summary: Before writing a paragraph, you must first decide on the most important idea to convey to your reader. The information in each paragraph must be related to that idea. A working thesis is like seed from which your paper, and your ideas, will grow. Building paragraphs can be like building skyscrapers. Any cracks, inconsistencies or other corruptions of the foundation can cause your whole paper to crumble.

original_text: Respected SirMadam, I, Your Name, sondaughter of Father's Name, residing at Your Address, wish to lodge a formal complaint and request you to register an FIR in this matter. On Date of Incident, at approximately Time of Incident, an incident occurred at Location of Incident. The details are as follows Provide a detailed account of what happened, including any relevant circumstances and facts. Be as specific as possible. If applicable, list any items that were stolen or damaged, along with their
summary: Respected SirMadam wants to lodge a formal complaint and request you to register an FIR in this matter. On date of incident, at approximately Time of Incident, an incident occurred at Location of the incident. If applicable, list any items that were stolen or damaged, along with their description and approximate value.

original_text: King Dasharatha ruled the prosperous kingdom of Ayodhya and had four sons Rama, Bharata, Lakshmana, and Shatrughna. Rama, the eldest and most virtuous, won the hand of the beautiful and devoted Princess Sita in a swayamvara ceremony by stringing and breaking Shiva's divine bow. Just as plans were made for Rama to be crowned king, Dasharatha's second wife, Kaikeyi, influenced by her wicked maid Manthara, demanded the king fulfill two boons he had previously granted her. She demanded that Rama be
summary: Dasharatha had four sons: Rama, Bharata, Lakshmana and Shatrughna. He won the hand of Princess Sita in a swayamvara ceremony. Kaikeyi demanded that her son be exiled to the forest for fourteen years. She refused to be parted from him and he died soon after.
